Reviews.Title: “Faultless”
Reviews.Author: tanagogo1
Reviews.Content: The PPSA are perfectly located off Orchard Rd and attached to 313 Somerset shopping centre. It's an easy location to get to most places in Spore as its right next door to Somerset MRT. The quality of accommodation is very high, the service is faultless and the suites are serviced daily (except Sundays). The suites do cost more than others, but there is wireless included, use of business suite, excellent facilities and a good hearty breakfast in the morning. If I had one complaint, it would be that they only serve dim sum for breakfast once a week! I am sure that this is to cater for their multinational guests. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Bit expensive, but excellent room and service | stayed 3.5 weeks”
Reviews.Author: JeanLouisV
Reviews.Content: Likes: - new building, design rooms, pleasant lobby and atmosphere, half open-air setting. - good soundproofing. - small kitchen, but perfectly designed and well equipped. - service with a smile and efficient: if something is broken, they will repair it immediately. - for staying 3 weeks and half, they kindly moved me after 10 days to a larger room. Thank you! - just next to underground and of course the Orchard glitz, also supermarket across the road. Not dislikes, but some points to remember: - cannot open windows. - on the expensive side. Of course, Singapore is expensive, and I think that they are the only apartments with kitchen which are modern, in a good location and of high standard. Just expect what you pay for, not the superb deal. - "Executive suite" is quite small as you have no living room... but the setup is quite ingenious. - Pool: cold water (sorry people: I am a bit of a spoiled brat who likes warm pool). - You must book one week at least, and you have some formalities to complete before you can book the room (sending credit cards copies, etc...)... OK, fair policy, just be prepared. Would I go back (if company pays expenses?): definitively!

Reviews.Title: “Superb Service!!”
Reviews.Author: simplyp
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for one week with my brothers. The service was EXCELLENT!! They were very consistent with their service, no matter who is attending to you from their Front Office to the people at the Pacific Lounge. We have might request a lot of things during our stay but you would not see or feel that we were disturbing them. Coming from the same industry before, I must say that they have a HIGH QUALITY OF SERVICE. Aside from from their service the facilities were great, they have the Sauna, Swimming Pool and the Living Room. Thank you very much for your hospitality!!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice and comfy room at a good location”
Reviews.Author: Chris3669
Reviews.Content: It is my first time staying at the Pan Pacific Serviced Suites Singapore and the friendliness and helpfulness of the staff is the first thing I noticed. The overall fittings and amenities are first class with a pool, a full size gym which includes the normal machines plus free weights which is unusual, a hot spa + steam room. I found the pool a bit small, a bit on the cold side. It also includes a living room where you can relax away from your apartment which includes a pool table, wii, coffee machine and outside decking. The location is perfect which is right next to Somerset mrt and adjacent to 313 mall. I would firmly recommend this to anybody staying in a serviced apartment in Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Definitley Recommended”
Reviews.Author: 24Kaz77
Reviews.Content: I have been staying at Pan Pacific Serviced Suites since July (on business and still here). Everything about the place is exceptional, especially the staff who are so friendly. Nothing is too much trouble for any of them. I am staying in one of the smaller suites but it still has every home comfort. It is exceptionally clean. It has a well equipped gym, hot and cold spa's, steam rooms, and swimming pool. Towels and water provided. Rooms have kitchen area with hob, toaster, microwave, pots, pans, cutlery, fridge/freezer, dining table and chairs. Bathroom with bath, toilet, separate shower, sink and washer/dryer. In bedroom, 2 double wardrobes, safe, iron and ironing board, hairdryer. There is a telephone and free internet access. Desk to work at along with stationary, flat screen TV, IPod speakers. The bed is King Size and bedding is changed alternate days. Shops are less than 1min walk away. Breakfast is provided but for other meals there are lots of restaurants, pubs and food outlets on the doorstep. The suites are very central and are well recommended.

Reviews.Title: “Our second home”
Reviews.Author: Judds09
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have been visiting this establishment for over a year now and I finally I have found the time to write a review. The location is wonderful, the rooms are very nice and the stand out for us is that the staff are so very friendly and helpful to the point were we very comfortable - almost like being at home!

Reviews.Title: “Amazing service, fantastic apartment, highly recommend”
Reviews.Author: AngharadM
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Pan Pacific for a few weeks on a work trip. The service was amazing, the apartment was fantastic, and the location was great. All the staff went above and beyond what I would have expected. A big thank you to all of them. Will use again when returning to Singapore.

Reviews.Title: “Will be considering the Pan Pacific chain for future stays”
Reviews.Content: My 3-nights stay at the serviced suite for my mother's medical check-up in SGH could not have been more perfect thanks to the help of the hotel. I booked for a two-bedroom executive suite but when I reached my room on the 16th floor to find out that I was upgraded to a penthouse, my impression was that the reception staff managed the shortage of rooms very quickly and promptly, I was in bliss to discover a fully equipped kitchen and gigantic living room. The stay gets more personalized from that point on, every request of mine was met with courtesy, from requesting a privacy curtain for the master bed's bathroom, to fix the lighting on the stairs to directions, the service was efficient--and with a smile. The service is the epitome of smiles in this hotel, there's a personal assistant who assist you up to your room and show you how things work in the room, making your transition , be it short or long term stay, a total enjoyment. The gadgets are all high tech, and i loved the Molton Brown bath amenities. Massive room space made luggage space not a problem-- whereas this was the problem in most other hotels at the same price tag. The return airport transfer when we ordered a taxi was made in a van with its own tv and price? only a reasonable SGD40, perfect indeed! It doesn't stop there, the superior breakfast that i looked forward each passing day cannot be more relaxing. The buffet offers a small variation...but you can also order items ala carter (eg. sunnyside up), the food quality were top-notch and cannot be more perfect for a long stay or a short stay alike. However, there are minor faults, but these faults are mainly to do with the original design of the suite. The master bedroom needs a sturdy curtain as it can reveal a part of the person in the toilet and the person bathing. The bathtub is very slippery, the door that separates the toilet and the bath is design defying, when opening it it hits the toilet ( this fault can be seen in many other hotels in singapore, but I had not expected such in a serviced apartment). Other than that, everything is perfect. Thumbs up to the serviced suite, you guys have done more than a fine job, thanks from Khanh and family.

Reviews.Title: “If you want the best, go for Pan Pacific Serviced Suites”
Reviews.Author: Velter
Reviews.Content: I am travelling to Singapore for Business approximately 6 times a year. If you are planning to stay for at least 7 nights, you should definately consider the Pan Pacific Serviced Suites if you are looking for 5 star accomodation. I have now tried it twice and both stays have been excellent. I find the hotel quality in Singapore to be very high compared to other cities and there is plenty of options, but nothing quite beats the PPSS. First of all the suites are contemporary designed and very convenient, both for leisure and business. You will immidiately see that only high class materials are used, you get truly high speed internet, everything you need of TV programmes as well as features you wouldn't get at the standard business hotels like kitchen, washing machine/dryer etc. And you dont need to consider paying extra for anything. Water, coffee/breakfast, papers etc is available for free. You get an appartment - not just a suite...so are you tired of the endless identical business rooms, here is something different and better. Probably the best thing there is to say about this place is the service you get: The staff in reception somehow know you by name - and welcome you back...even if your visit was many months ago. Yes, the service is generally speaking good in Singapore hotels, but I feel you get the perfect blend of hospitality and privacy. To most travellers the location is perfect. Right on Orchard Road and just a few steps to a taxi lane and Somerset MRT. Personally I don't fancy the Orchard Road shopping hell, but as soon as you step indoor, you have a completely private and quiet stay. I am trying to find out something negative to write...I just can't think of anything. I will definately be back!

Reviews.Title: “NON-SMOKERS BEWARE!!!!!!!!! It is vile.”
Reviews.Author: RogerTruffle
Reviews.Content: This property does NOT have non-smoking rooms or non-smoking floors. This is not surprisingly not advertised anywhere in pre-purchase advertising and indeed only told to you if you ask. We had repeated trouble for the length of our stay with cigarette smoke entering the room, under the door, through the air conditioning. We even had the person in the room next to us smoking with her room door open (how lovely for her to clear the smoke from her own room) sending the smoke right into ours. When I asked about it management were pathetic seeming all at sea with the simplest request to move rooms. Eventually after tiring of their incompetence, I forfeited my pre-paid accommodation to stay at a better property. I strongly recommend against staying here. To be sure it is in a good location, just behind Orchard Road, but that does not make up for poor service. There are too many better alternatives within a stone's throw.

Reviews.Title: “FANTASTIC SERVICE & BRILLIANT LOCATION”
Reviews.Author: alantu
Reviews.Content: My wife and I with our 10 month old son stayed here for a holiday for 1 week leading up to the singapore grand prix and we had a fantastic stay. From the moment our taxi pulled up to the moment we left the staff at reception , our cleaning lady , the breakfast waitress all went out of there way to make us feel at home and provide us with exceptional service. Our 2 bedroom apartment was roomy and modern , and the 11th floor which we were on had a great shared living room were you could read books provided play WEE or have a coffee from the machine provided . The location is brilliant just behind Orchard rd and next to a brand new shopping center which provided you with everything you could need for your stay.The only down side is the minimun 7 night stay and that it is not a hotel therefore you dont have bars, room service ect but everything is at your finger tips as soon as you step out the door . If you are looking for a hotel alternative we can highly recomend the Pan Pacific Suites.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, exceptional service!”
Reviews.Author: Claybone
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed for a month, service was impressive! From the day we arrived to the day we left the staff couldn't do to much for us! From scanning documents, delivering bandaids to greeting us every morning. Facilities are great, including a decent hotel gym. My complaints was our matress was way too hard, bathroom wall is all glass (ie no privacy at all), and men working on the roof of 313 somerset looking into your room! Overall a very positive exerience!

Reviews.Title: “Impeccable Service”
Reviews.Author: kfoh
Reviews.Content: We have recently stayed at Pan Pacific Serviced Suites in Singapore and have nothing but praise. From the time we booked the room to our arrival, the service and care that was provided was impeccable and extremely personal. We were also traveling for the first time with our 10month old daughter and were nervous about her ability to adapt to her environment and the staff were very understanding. Overall, our stay was most enjoyable and we would like to commend them on the level of service provided at every customer touch point, from sales to front desk, to housekeeping and other service staff. Service with a smile has never been better defined. Only downside was the noise of the nearby construction which should be complete by end of this year but the staff made sure they gave us a room with minimal noise so our daughter could sleep.

Reviews.Title: “Sleek room, good services but oh the mighty Dust!”
Reviews.Author: mamamee
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the property during the GP season in Sept for 8 nights. Liked: -while making reservation, I asked for a room at garden level and away from the construction work (there`s one going on next door). They gave us one exactly per request without us mentioning it again while checking in. -the room interior design is sleek but the size is abit too small, with all the high-end equipment and utilities provided. -the front desk ladies staff and the breakfast lounge guy staff were very friendly and helpful. Even one lady (I think she`s our assigned PA) immediately ran out from the lobby to help us carry the stroller up the main stairs. We were asking for lots of bottled water, and the next day they continuously providing us with lots of it without being asked. -the housekeeping lady fold our piled up dried laundry, and also managed to rearrange my kid`s messy toys by the window. -I left behind my wallet somewhere in the room and emailed the staff about it, they were very helpful and communicate continuously, although couldn`t find it back. Disliked: -Dust!!! The room was extremely dusty (we stay at room 315), my husband could not stop sneezing while we were there, I never saw him sneeze that badly. I don`t know when was the last time they cleaned up the shelves, carpet, etc. When I place stuff on the higher shelves, poof! all the dust were flying up. Even when I looked under the kitchen cabinet to pick up something, to my Horror there`s a line between a never been cleaned dusty floor and a cleaned part, there`s even a quite big rubber toyball (don`t know who`s) sitting there. And there were food crumbs on the carpet too. Beware if you are allergic to dust or traveling with young children. -the amenities at our room never been replenish, we have to keep asking for it which was not delivered (is it because we asked for it at night?), and have to ask for it again the next day. -the swimming pool is wall to wall to next door construction work, it was a very disappointing environment, not due to the noise but due to lack of fresh air and good view. -Breakfast could be a boring experience with almost the same choices everyday. We are returning to Singapore this Nov and my husband have warned me not to return to this hotel because of the dust! This is why I only give three star for the rating. To be fair, I`m impressed with the room style and services provided but cleanliness was definitely out of hand.

Reviews.Title: “Spotless appartments, incredible staff”
Reviews.Author: StarEye2009
Reviews.Content: We stayed in Pan Pacific serviced apartments between Christmas 2008 and New year. We stayed in total 10 days. This place is perfect for an extended stay or if you want to have the freedom to have your own kitchen. The location is very central, close to Orchard Road and to an underground station. The staff was incredibly kind and helpful during all our stay. The only complaint was the noise from the building site next to our building (we were warned about the possible noise by the hotel managers a month before our trip to Singapore), but at our request the hotel staff moved us on the other side of the building after the first night. We were overall very impressed.

Reviews.Title: “Really great NEW Serviced Suites!”
Reviews.Author: ejblue
Reviews.Content: If you have an extended stay in Singapore ~ this is the place! The entire hotel is spotless, new and comfortable. The staff is exceptional. During my month stay I have asked for countless things and administrative help and received nothing less then a smile and proactive support. The staff is also very knowledgeable on questions about Singapore - which is helpful when your new to Singapore and your trying to re-locate. The decor is lovely contemporary (Flat screens in bedroom and living room, dvd player, kitchens with stoves ~ and best yet a washer/dryer!!!) Yes, there is construction next door. But they were very forthcoming in letting us know about it. They are sympathetic to the noise, but there is not much they can do ~ Singapore is growing! The Gym, Dining area and common areas are lovely and peaceful. The staff is delightful and very professional. The price (I feel) is very fair. The housekeeping staff is exceptional. I even gave feedback partially through our stay and each item was addressed and fixed the very next day. The MTR is right next door and your steps away from Orchard road! Oh and there is "good" coffee and tea available 24/7. High speed internet & full breakfast included in price. I would have given this hotel 5 stars except for the construction. But it looks like they are close to finishing. Regardless, I've stayed in Singapore many times and find that Pan Pacific Hotels are the best when it comes to service and constantly trying to improve. I would definitely check it out if your not familiar with this hotel.

HotelInfo.Name: Pan Pacific Serviced Suites Orchard Singapore
HotelInfo.Address: 96 Somerset Road, Singapore 238163, Singapore
